name: ice-punch
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.
